data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NKbsGMw2m_AQ7kNvgF4c12U&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBR58uB7KXdnmhLCKr6PA2T02jS54ZPRhkC0fn2U04egA&oe=663A0EB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=knbC-nqEQfAQ7kNvgHJs7Cx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAjSNahSyNIVy4wixbaeo21Z0B1nPDscEetfWnkjpLOqg&oe=663A1C52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SQtH2de2cR8Q7kNvgFjEap_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAxV5xQpx5tzX0Bq7xcXJvANfH12HI3HNfldbv5yxp8KA&oe=663A1FD0)
